timeline.bodyText:
We cannot rely on external logging in BashJavaUtils.
The logs have to be forced into the stdout independently from logging config to pass them to FLINK_INHERITED_LOGS env var which is used by the main Flink process to log on its startup.
timeline.author: azagrebin

replies.bodyText: It works though? All logging output goes to stdout, and the configuration things are split out based on a prefix. Everything else is treated as logging output; see flink-dist/src/main/flink-bin/bin/config.sh:extractLoggingOutputs()
replies.author: zentol

replies.bodyText: oh, we actually rely on default log config to output to stdout, sorry for confusion
